actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 to revise the requirements for labeling of certain wool and cashmere products.
short_title: Wool Suit Fabric Labeling Fairness and International Standards Conforming Act

summary.text: Wool Suit Fabric Labeling Fairness and International Standards Conforming Act - Amends the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 to declare that specified wool products, including cashmere, are misbranded if their average diameter of wool fiber does not meet certain standards of fineness. Authorizes the Federal Trade Commission to adopt additional standards or deviations.

titles.title: Wool Suit Fabric Labeling Fairness and International Standards Conforming Act
A bill to amend the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 to revise the requirements for labeling of certain wool and cashmere products.
